WELCOME TO
virtual interact

[/vc_column_text]

Stress Free Resource Management

Our expertise in call center  business process outsourcing solutions can minimize your administrative worries.

Dedicated Call Center Agents

Hire our teams of expert call center agents depending upon your special request or dedicated needs.

Your Best Source To Outsource

virtual interact provides a cost-effective way to engage with customers to increase sales.

Complete Peace Of Mind

We guarantee significant cost reduction because we provide customized service plans to suit businesses of all sizes and budgets.No commitment and no strings attached

How To Get Started

 

At virtual connect, we make our involvement with the execution and the board of all PC utilizations of the organization accessible to clients, Look at how to get everything rolling:

    1. Sign up
    2. Our operations / onboarding manager contact to gather requirement for start up
    3. Assign / train resources based on requirements gathered
    4. On boarding team will kick starts the project
    5. After a week, Schedule meeting with client for any feedback and inquiries
    6. QA Operations Teams Monitor the progress from the day one for continuous coaching and QA

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Learn More” style=”custom” custom_background=”#d8d8d8″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.virtualinteract.com%2Fhow-it-works%2F|title:HOW%20IT%20WORKS||” css=”.vc_custom_1614500605036{margin-top: 40px !important;}” el_class=”hit-btn”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1620461998422{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”light_bg” el_id=”features”][vc_column]

  • Daily/Weekly/Monthly Reports

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1620461952777{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background: #ffffff url(https://www.virtualinteract.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/home-3.jpeg?id=6743) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg” el_id=”BUSINESS STRATEGY”][vc_column width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1614501373170{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}” el_class=”business-stretagy-txt”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1614501382122{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”counter-column”][vc_column_text]

Business Strategy

At virtual communicate, we offer types of assistance past the customary phone client support, selling, client reliability, maintenance, and so on arranging administrations customized to our clients, our focal hub being the utilization and execution.

We act as a departmental area of our clients’ companies, adapting to the philosophy, values and way of working of each one of them, so that the end client does not perceive us as a call center but as one more department of the company.

We do thorough administration in touch with Clients, covering the different correspondence stations on the lookout: phone, email, SMS, snap to call, web cooperation, webchat, virtual entertainment, and so on.

Our Strategy

  1. Reduce down expense and above for our client and give them the best experienced assets.
  2. Guarantee administrations of clients through modified executions.
  3. 24/7 Call Center with all operations, Admin, HR, QA, Training.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

I wanted to send my thanks for the excellent work that Ella and Ray were able to provide for our Hospital. When we had a need for a rapid, remote team to help us handle a large volume of requests for COVID vaccine appointments. You were able to hire two team members, train with us on our medical record and phone system, and get us up and running to meet our Community’s needs. It came together much quicker than we could ever have hired directly for the job. You and your team were so easy and professional to work with, great tech support. We can’t thank you enough! I would be happy to serve as a reference for any future clients for you, and we would definitely utilize your services again. Thank you

Michelle Whalley, Ridgecrest Regional Hospital

virtual interact has made a real positive influence in my office. We have extreme call demands and they were able to relieve a lot of the receptionist duties that were very challenging to fulfill. I am very happy with the service and plan to continue long term.

South Florida Dermatology

virtualinteract helped us greatly increase our call center performance with very professional and proactive staff. virtual interact is very accommodating and always willing to meet and surpass our expectations. We recommend them for any of your business needs. ".

Union County Healthcare

I came across Real-Interact and reached out in regards to a telemarketer for my small business to do my cold calling. Real-Interact was extremely receptive and let me explain everything in my own words as to what my goal was. Everyone on the team I interacted with was extremely professional, straight forward, prompt and well informed. Within a short period of time the team had my campaign up and rolling with the telemarketer doing an incredible job following my script. I would recommend any business in need of telemarketing services reach out to Real-Interact.

Hammond Health Services

They are professional on the phone, and we are getting good results.

Family Health Clinic

virtualinteract has been tremendous for our growth--going from one Urgent Care to three. They are able to handle high call volumes with professionalism. I trust them and would highly recommend them for your business.

Premier Healthcare express urgent care

The burden of phone calls interrupting patient interactions has been extremely helpful, especially as we navigate through a pandemic. Their team swooped in and got us rolling within a week. We are looking forward to a continued relationship with virtual interact.

Health Quilt

!important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

Why Outsource Call Center Services

Call center outsourcing is recognized worldwide by all sorts of businesses to promote and market their business. Need to outsource outbound call center services and inbound call center services has increased because it is a cost effective and a proven strategy to get more sales and also for providing better customer support.One of the most cost effective technique is to outsource call center services. That’s why many organizations outsource their telemarketing and sales department to BPOs.

Outbound Call Center Services

Outbound sales call center providers make calls to customers with an intention to improve sales of client’s products or services. At virtual interact, we have outbound sales call center with most professional and experienced call center agents who have expertise in outbound call center services. The customer care representatives that we have are industry professionals who definitely will prove to be a good return to your investment (ROI). We as an outbound call centers are focused on sales and other services include:

  • Lead Generation
  • Telemarketing
  • Appointment Scheduling

Inbound Call Center Services / Customer Service

Inbound call center services function in an opposite manner than outbound call center. Inbound call center take care of incoming calls from customers and mainly deal with services and product’s support.Having inbound call center is a challenge for many businesses in terms of cost of hiring qualified staff and up keeping of infrastructure. With our call center outsourcing services, you’ll be cutting down your costs of training, facility cost and cost of insurance and many more benefits that come with it.At virtual interact, we handle calls of customers on behalf of our clients and we make it sure that the actions abide by service level agreement. Our inbound call center services include:

  • Call Answering
  • Technical Support
  • Inquiry Handling
  • Customer Support

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1620461611934{background-color: #f8f7f2 !important;}” el_class=”light_bg” el_id=”Contacts Us”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

CONTACT US

Call us, send us an email or a letter - or come around to have a talk. We are consistently here to assist in the manner we can.

    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”text-center” width=”1/2″]
